solution_line_template: Six sets of 1 dozen of doughnuts cost ${price_per_dozen} x {sets_of_one_dozen} = $<<{sets_of_one_dozen}*{price_per_dozen}={cost_one_dozen_sets}>>{cost_one_dozen_sets}.
Three sets of 2 dozens of doughnuts cost ${price_per_two_dozen} x {sets_of_two_dozen} = ${cost_two_dozen_sets}.
